item.name: Home
item.description: Hahl-muh-nee* woke me up with the sun and told me to get ready for school. I pretended not to hear her and squeezed my eyes shut. Though I could feel the sunlight hitting my face, the cold night air lingered in my room. I swept the covers over my head. Even so, I could hear the [因
